messages.subject: [UnschoolingDiscussion]
messages.msgSnippet: Does anyone on this list have the link to a website on not spanking that had a link in it to something like a Christians who don t believe in spanking
messages.messageBody:
Does anyone on this list have the link to a website on "not spanking" that
had a link in it to something like a "Christians who don't believe in spanking"
website? I know...a tall, vague order :o) but I'm talking with some Christian
homeschool mom's who believel in attachment parenting, co-sleeping, no
vaccinating, etc...but some of them still spank. Just wanted to give them something
to read. Some of them are really on the fence. Big thank you in advance.

Nancy B. in WV


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
